200102.n: Late Ottoman and Modern Turkish Foreign Policy

200202.n: Late Ottoman and Modern Turkish Foreign Policy

200302.n: Late Ottoman and Modern Turkish Foreign Policy

200402.n: Late Ottoman and Modern Turkish Foreign Policy

200502.n: Late Ottoman and Modern Turkish Foreign Policy

catList: This course presents a detailed survey, based on primary source materials, of (a) the foreign policy orientations that the Ottoman state was forced to adopt in the face of developments originating in the realm of the Eurocentric international relations of the last quarter of the 19th century; and (b) the foreign policy course pursued by the modern Turkish Republic from the first quarter of the 20th century. Special attention will be devoted to exploring the inner connections between Turkey's foreign policy issues, and international politics in general, as well as the continuities and discontinuities of a critical century in the history of Turkish foreign policy.
